Name: Starway: BaRaider
About the game: In 2639 AD, unknown machine lifeforms invaded the human space colony planet. They are entrenched in energy mining areas and have taken away large amounts of energy debris. Losing the mining area means that humans' spacecrafts cannot get any energy supplies. All crew members are at risk. As one the 'Starway' soilders, you are required to defeat the invaders on colony planets and retake the diggings. Game Features Various of super-giant mechanical monsters are attacking. Players have to survive from numerous of bullets. Teleporting in all directions to avoid being attacked. Multiple choices for skill system building: Bullet Time, Gravity Bomb, Laser Gun etc.. Multiple Modes Vanquishing huge planet mechanical boss. Wiping out the space base of enemies. Surviving from the mechanical frenzy within limited time. 1v1 Defeating the monsters who can mirror the human skills. More excitings are coming soon.... MAIL：special@xrlinkup.com
Developers: 广州雷氪沉浸技术有限公司
Publishers: 广州雷氪沉浸技术有限公司
